root: ^Head down doing work. Simple data entry is so mindless.

Break: ^It also is somehow so energy consuming. Maybe I could go to the break room kitchen and grab something to eat?
Working: ^But I have no time to take a break. Work keeps the brain busy.
CoworkerStart: ^Hi Dillon, I'm good, how are you?
CheerUp: ^Oh come on, I'm just trying to have a bit of a conversation. Didn't see you on break so I thought to just check on you.
bar: ^Anyway. I was going to ask if you wanted to go to the bar after this.
coworker_interaction: ^I'm pretty good. Just the same old thing.
^But hey, how's it going with your partner? Still mad at you?
continue: ^Eh, they’ll get over it eventually. Not your fault that you just need the time to get ready, y’know?
^If they were half as understanding, they’d give you the time to recover and get back to it when you’re ready. Isn’t that what love is?
thats_the_spirit: ^Thats the spirit. Hey, I got an idea that might cheer you up, why not get a drink after this?
^The bar’s close and you look like you need to loosen up. And you owe me a drink anyway so perfect opportunity.
awkward: ^Actually, I got an idea that might cheer you up, why not get a drink after this?
^The bar’s close and you look like you need to loosen up. And you owe me a drink anyway so perfect opportunity.
okay: ^Well, invites still open if you want it. We should probably get back to work soon.
